queryConfiguration.defaultPrefixes: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX coins-base: <http://www.coinsweb.nl/cbim-2.0.rdf#>

query.description: COINS 2.0 Lite profile check on predicate usage
query.format: The subject ${a} uses an unsupported predicate ${b} to object ${c}, check link to Google! for more info
